tools.name: set_track_graphics
tools.description: Set graphics properties for one or more tracks. Available properties depend on track type: label tracks (colorBackground, colorForeground, colorDuration, colorText, colorShadow, fontName, fontSize, fontStyle, lineWidth, labelLayoutPosition, labelLayoutJustification), value tracks (colorBackground, colorForeground, colorText, colorShadow, fontName, fontSize, fontStyle, lineWidth, unit), vector tracks (colorMap, unit). color values must be a hexadecimal color strings #RRGGBBAA (e.g. '#aabbccff') and colorMap values must be one of the following strings: 'Parula', 'Heat', 'Jet', 'Turbo', 'Hot', 'Gray', 'Magma', 'Inferno', 'Plasma', 'Viridis', 'Cividis', or 'Github'. Font style values must be one of the following strings: 'normal', 'bold', 'italic', or 'bold italic'. Label layout justification values must be one of the following strings: 'top', 'centred', or 'bottom'

identifier.description: The unique identifier of the track

colorMap.description: color map name (vector tracks only, 'Parula', 'Heat', 'Jet', 'Turbo', 'Hot', 'Gray', 'Magma', 'Inferno', 'Plasma', 'Viridis', 'Cividis', or 'Github')

colorBackground.description: Background color as #RRGGBBAA color string (label/value tracks only)

colorForeground.description: Foreground color as #RRGGBBAA color string (label/value tracks only)

colorDuration.description: Duration color as #RRGGBBAA color string (label tracks only)

colorText.description: Text color as #RRGGBBAA color string (label/value tracks only)

colorShadow.description: Shadow color as #RRGGBBAA color string (label/value tracks only)

fontSize.description: Font size in points (label/value tracks only)

lineWidth.description: Line width in pixels (label/value tracks only)

unit.description: Unit string (value/vector tracks only, empty string to clear)

labelLayoutJustification.description: Label layout justification: 'top', 'centred', or 'bottom' (label tracks only)

tracks.description: Array of track identifiers with their graphics properties to modify
